description:
This is a series of "traditional" accessories to help you on your adventures.
This set includes 4 accessory items that enhance HP, Power, Action Interval, and Movement Interval respectively.

All units can be equipped.

â€»The main game (sold separately) is required to use this product.
In addition, please use this item after updating the game in the event that the latest patch is required.
name: Handy-Dandy Accessory Set
